workout_groups.name: Super Endurance & Survival Conditioning
workout_groups.description: Develop ultra-endurance, resilience, and survival capability in extreme conditions.

workouts.name: Ultra-Distance Running
workouts.description: Run extreme distances at competitive speeds with no rest.

workouts.name: Extreme Temperature Training
workouts.description: Train in sub-zero or extreme heat conditions without protective clothing.

workouts.name: Submersion Breath Holding
workouts.description: Hold breath underwater for extended durations under stress.

workouts.name: Load-Bearing Mountain Climb
workouts.description: Climb a steep mountain with 150+ lbs of gear.

workouts.name: Full Gear Weighted Ruck March
workouts.description: March long distances with 100+ lbs of gear, no stops.

workouts.name: Desert Heat Endurance Test
workouts.description: Survive high-temperature exertion without excessive hydration.

workouts.name: Frozen Water Submersion Test
workouts.description: Stay submerged in near-freezing water to train cold resistance.

workouts.name: Combat Endurance Sprint Drill
workouts.description: Sprint between cover points in a combat scenario under extreme fatigue.

workouts.name: Survival Fire & Shelter Drill
workouts.description: Build a survival shelter and fire in a harsh environment with minimal tools.

workouts.name: 24-Hour Sleep Deprivation Challenge
workouts.description: Operate at full capacity without sleep, completing survival and endurance tasks.

workouts.name: Underwater Navigation Course
workouts.description: Navigate an underwater course while breath-holding and avoiding obstacles.

workouts.name: Jungle Survival Training
workouts.description: Survive in the jungle with only a knife and basic gear.

workouts.name: Frozen Cliffside Climb
workouts.description: Climb an icy mountain face with minimal gear.

workouts.name: Hyperoxia Breath Training
workouts.description: Train oxygen efficiency by controlling breath cycles under stress.

workouts.name: Fasted Ultra-Endurance Challenge
workouts.description: Complete high-intensity physical challenges while in a fasted state.

workouts.name: Cold Water Endurance Swim
workouts.description: Swim for extended distances in frigid waters with minimal gear.

workouts.name: Super Long-Distance Sand Dune Sprint
workouts.description: Sprint over deep sand dunes for miles, testing stamina and footwork.

workouts.name: Urban Survival & Evasion
workouts.description: Survive and evade capture in a simulated urban environment for 48 hours.

workouts.name: Full Submersion Ice Survival
workouts.description: Survive in an ice-cold water immersion scenario, maintaining core temperature control.

workouts.name: Cave Diving Endurance
workouts.description: Swim through an underwater cave system with breath-hold segments.

workouts.name: Tundra Expedition Endurance
workouts.description: Travel across arctic terrain with minimal supplies.

workouts.name: Torrential Rain Trail Run
workouts.description: Run through rough jungle terrain during a heavy downpour, maintaining speed and balance.

workouts.name: Volcanic Heat Resistance Training
workouts.description: Train in extreme geothermal heat zones to adapt to high temperatures.

workouts.name: Underground Tunnel Escape
workouts.description: Escape a pitch-black underground tunnel system with limited oxygen supply.

workouts.name: Tree-to-Tree Canopy Traverse
workouts.description: Navigate a dense jungle canopy using only tree branches and rope systems.

workouts.name: Desert Night Navigation
workouts.description: Travel across an open desert at night without GPS, using only celestial navigation.

workouts.name: Marathon Portage Test
workouts.description: Carry a 75+ lb object for marathon distance over varied terrain.

workouts.name: Mountain Descent Free Climb
workouts.description: Descend a steep mountain with no ropes, testing control and foot placement.
